casename: Foo Tee Sey v Loy Hui Eng
counsel: Yap Teong Liang and Wong Lai Keen (Hin Rai & Tan) for the appellant/petitioner; Lim May Li (Lim & Pillay) for the respondent
tags-parsed: Family Law/Matrimonial assets/Division/Direct and indirect contribution towards purchase of matrimonial home/Marriage lasting 18 years with two children/Division of 60-40 in wife's favour/Whether fair and reasonable

Family Law/Matrimonial assets/Division/Duty to maintain matrimonial home/Wife paying money paid towards maintenance and upkeep of matrimonial home/Whether taken as direct or indirect contribution/Whether fact that wife has sole occupation of matrimonial home during period separation affects duty to maintain
